prompt:
Write Python code that defines the following pandas DataFrame representing Pokemon stats:

import pandas as pd
data = {
    "PokemonID": [1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9],
    "Name": ["Bulbasaur", "Ivysaur", "Venusaur", "Charmander", "Charmeleon", "Charizard", "Squirtle", "Wartortle", "Blastoise"],
    "Type1": ["Grass", "Grass", "Grass", "Fire", "Fire", "Fire", "Water", "Water", "Water"],
    "Type2": ["Poison", "Poison", "Poison", None, None, "Flying", None, None, None],
    "HP": [45, 60, 80, 39, 58, 78, 44, 59, 79],
    "Attack": [49, 62, 82, 52, 64, 84, 48, 63, 83],
    "Defense": [49, 63, 83, 43, 58, 78, 65, 80, 100],
    "Speed": [45, 60, 80, 65, 80, 100, 43, 58, 78]
}
df = pd.DataFrame(data)

After creating the DataFrame, the code should: 1) Add a new column "TotalStats" which is the sum of "HP", "Attack", "Defense", and "Speed". 2) Identify and print the "Name" of the Pokemon with the highest "TotalStats". 3) For each "Type1", calculate and print the average "Speed". Provide only Python code.
evaluation_criteria: Code should correctly define the DataFrame, create the "TotalStats" column, find the Pokemon with the highest total stats, and calculate average speed per Type1.
